title: Automania 2000
creator_credit: John Halas and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: An animated satire on problems of automotive design and lack of proper roads and parking facilities. Shows what could happen in the year 2000 when people are forced to live in their cars and the car finally becomes able to reproduce itself. Animator: Harold Whitaker; Writer: Joy Batchelor.
